conbody.p: For the purpose of sharing, you can export reports of test suites into other formats such as HTML, CSV, PDF, and JUnit.

li.p: From version 8.5.5 onwards, Katalon Studio automatically generates HTML reports for both test suite and test suite collection.
From version 7.0.0 onwards, Katalon Studio automatically generates JUnit reports for both test suite and test suite collection.
For Katalon Studio - Platform Edition version 8.5.0 onwards:

ul.li: Running in debug mode does not automatically generate basic reports (HTML, PDF, CSV). With the debug mode, Katalon Studio - Platform Edition only exports the JUnit report.
Running in debug mode does not automatically send execution results to Katalon TestOps.
You cannot manually export reports for debug mode.
